description: Triangle of numbers related to congruum problem: T(n,k)=n^2+2nk-k^2 with n>k>0, starting at T(2,1)=7.
comments: The congruum problem is to find h (A057103) such that there are integers x (A055096), y (A057105) and z (A056203) with h=x^2-y^2=z^2-x^2.Refers to A057102, which had an incorrect description and has been replaced by A256418. As a result the present sequence should be re-checked. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 06 2015
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Congruum Problem.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Aug 02 2000
